alert.note: Alert for Washington (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 5:41PM CDT until April 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Chicot County in southeastern Arkansas... Southern Ashley County in southeastern Arkansas... Southern Washington County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 541 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Portland, or 10 miles northeast of Wilmot, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Eudora and Chicot Junction around 600 PM CDT. Avon around 615 PM CDT. Estill around 630 PM CDT. Hollandale around 635 PM CDT. Darlove around 640 PM CDT. Murphy around 645 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Arkansas...and central, northwestern and west central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
